258042.「よく来たな！ いい景色だろう！: You finally made it! Lovely scenery, isn't it?

258043.「ここが 貴様たちに用意した\n とっておきの 死に場所だ。: This is the perfect place for you to die.

258044.「……魔勇者アンルシア！？\n 貴様が 滅びの手だったのか！:
...Evil Hero Anlucia!? You're the Hand of
Perdition!?

258045.「妙だな。会ったばかりなのに……\n どうしてか 貴様のことが わかってしまう。:
It's strange. I just met you... but somehow I
already know who you are.

258046.「一度は 勇者を名乗った者が\n 世界を滅ぼすことに 加担するとは……\n 堕ち:
For someone who once called herself a Hero to
be complicit in the destruction of the
world... you truly have fallen from grace.

258048.「フン。かつては 勇者として\n あがめられたものだが 今は ちがう。\n 煮え:
Hmph. I used to be celebrated as a Hero, but
no more. My simmering hatred has changed me.

258049.「私は 滅びの手を勝利に導く刃。\n 滅びの剣アンルシア！:
I am the blade that leads the Hand of
Perdition to victory. Anlucia, the Sword of
Perdition!

258050.「貴様ら 護りの手を始末し\n この無価値な世界を 滅ぼす！:
I shall kill you, the Hand of Protection, and
destroy this worthless world!

258051.「滅亡の瞬間を 目に焼きつけながら\n もろともに消滅する……ああっ そのとき\:
To have that moment of destruction seared into
my eyes as I disappear with everything... ahh,
I'm trembling with joy at the thought of it!

258052.「相棒。ここは 私に まかせてくれ。\n 奴を見てると ムカついて しょうがない:
Partner. Let me handle this. I can't stand the
sight of her.

258053.「気が合うな。私も 貴様を見てると\n イライラしてくるよ。:
Then we think alike. Looking at you disgusts
me as well.

258054.「滅びの剣のチカラ……とくと見よ！: Behold... the power of the Sword of Perdition!

258055.「……あやつでは 心もとないな。\n 人選の あやまりではないのか？:
...I'm not so sure about her. Are you sure you
made the right selection?

258056.「まあ 見てろって。なかなかのモンだぜ。\n 魔勇者の中の 世界への憎悪を材料に:
Well, just take a look. It's quite the feat. I
took the Evil Hero's hatred of the world, and
made it into the strongest Sword of Perdition.

258057.「勇者を望む奴らも この世界も\n 何もかも 腐りきっているッ！:
People who aspire to be Heroes, this world,
all of it is rotten to the core!

258058.「覚醒できなかった ひがみだろう！ \n 貴様は 真の勇者たりえなかった！:
You're just jealous you couldn't awaken! You
could never be a true Hero!

258059.「あはは！ 心底うれしいよ。\n しょせん 勇者は 私に似合う衣装じゃ\n なか:
Ahaha! I'm actually relieved that's the case.
The role of Hero never suited me from the very
beginning!

258060.「この世界が 窮屈で たまらなかった！\n 何にも しばられることなく 自由にチ:
I was so bored with the cramped conditions of
this world! How I wished I could freely use my
power without being restricted by anything!

258061.「勇者などッ！ 正義に束縛された\n 弱者のあやつり人形！ 弱者のイケニエッ！！:
The Hero! A puppet for the weak, bound by
justice! A sacrifice for the weak!!

258062.「あやつり人形……だと？\n 訂正しろっ！\n 勇者への侮辱は この私が許さん！:
A puppet...? You're wrong! I will not allow
you to tarnish the Hero's name!

258063.「こんな私でも……その存在に あこがれ \n 尊いと思う気持ちは 確かに 持って:
Even as I am... I have a longing for and
respect for that title. A Hero is the hope of
the people!

258064.「……そういうことだったのか。\n 私もまた 魔勇者アンルシア……。:
...So that's what this is all about. I, too,
am Evil Hero Anlucia...

258065.「かつての魔勇者は 勇者のチカラを \n 追い求めるあまり 外道に走りもしたが…:
The Evil Hero may have strayed from the proper
path in pursuit of power, but she also
possessed the heart to protect this world.

258066.「この世界を肯定する意思に 触れることで\n その心が揺さぶられ ようやく覚醒し:
It seems that being touched by the will to
accept this world has stirred my heart and
awakened me. As the Shield of Protection...

258067.「ファビエルめ……奴も 俺と同じように\n 魔勇者を 素材に選んだってわけか。:
Fabiel... so he chose the Evil Hero as his
material, just like me.

258068.「もっとも 魔勇者の心は 大半が\n 世界への憎悪で 占められていた。:
But the Evil Hero's heart was mostly filled
with hatred for this world.

258069.「もともと 護りの盾として 生みだすには\n 不向きな素材だってのによぉ\n こ:
She's not material suitable to be used as the
Shield of Protection, and yet now she's
awakening... interesting!

258070.「魔勇者の中にあったのは 圧倒的な憎悪！\n 護ろうとする意思など 気の迷いでし:
What was inside the Evil Hero was overwhelming hatred! The will to protect was nothing more than a flight of fancy. You're just an
insignificant leftover!

258071.「いっちょう前に 正義をかかげるくせに\n 肝心の 勇者のチカラすらない。\n:
You try to uphold justice, but lack the power
of a Hero, which is the most important thing.
You are nothing to be feared!

258072.「御託はいい！ かかってこいッ！\n 憎しみの化身である 貴様を倒すことで\n:
Enough! Come at me, then! I will overcome my
past by defeating you, who have become hatred
incarnate!

258074.「バカな！ 今さっき 覚醒したばかりの\n ザコなんぞに かなわぬとは……。:
Impossible! There's no way I could've lost to
this trash who only just awakened...

258075.「勝敗は 決した。\n 降参しろ。命までは 取らぬ。:
This fight is over. Surrender. I will not take
your life.

258078.「否！ 余は 滅びの手マデサゴーラである！: Wrong! I am Madesagora, the Hand of Perdition!

258079.「よく見れば そなたは いつぞやの……\n ふたたび 余の前に 立ちはだかるとは:
Now that I have a closer look, it's you...
For you to stand before me once again, we must
have quite a connection.

258080.「貴様は この世界の 創造主であろう。\n 滅ぼすなど 論外のはず！:
You are the creator of this world. To destroy
it is unconscionable!

258081.「だからこそである。\n 余の創作活動は いまだ 道なかば。:
There is a reason for that. I am still in the
middle of the creative process.

258082.「勇者との戦いに 敗れたことより\n 未完の作品を残し 死んでしまったことが\n:
Even more than being defeated in battle by the
Hero, there is no greater shame than to die
and leave behind an unfinished work!

258083.「いかに 心魂を尽くした大作と言えど\n 未完の作品を 世に残すなど\n 芸術家:
No matter how much heart and soul they pour
into their craft, an artist who leaves a work
unfinished is no artist at all!

258084.「だが しかし！\n 余は 滅びの手として よみがえり\n 未完の作品を 完成さ:
But now! I have been resurrected as the Hand
of Perdition, and have been given the chance
to complete my unfinished work.

258085.「世界創造という名の ひとつの芸術作品を\n 世界の破壊をもって仕上げる よろこ:
What a joy to finish this work of art, the
creation of a world with its very
destruction! I...I tremble with delight!

258086.「貴様の身勝手で 滅ぼされて たまるか！\n 私が させない。私が 世界を護る！:
I will not let your selfishness destroy us! I
won't allow it. I will protect this world!

258088.「身のほどを 知れい！！\n 偽りの世界は 余の創作物であるぞ。\n 創るも 壊:
Know your place! This false world is MY
creation. I can create it or destroy it
whenever I so choose!

258089.「自らが創造した世界を 壊してこそ\n 余は 芸術の神髄へと 至れるのだ。\n:
Only by destroying the world of my own
creation will I be able to attain the essence
of true artistry. All is for the sake of art!!

258090.「わ 私も手を貸すぞ……滅びの手よ。: I will lend you my aid... Hand of Perdition.

258092.「ともに 世界を滅ぼそう！: Together we will destroy the world!

258094.「貴様こそ 余の失敗作であった。\n 奈落の門を開けるための 道具として\n 創:
You are a failure. I created you as a tool to
open the Abyss Gate.

258095.「最期まで 使えぬ奴であったなぁ。: You were useless to the very end.

258096.「相棒すら 切り捨てるかッ！！\n 見下げはてた奴め！ 立ちあえ！:
You cut down your own partner!? You are a
disgrace! Stand and face me!

258097.「グフハハハ……そう せくな。\n 破魂の審判が 結末を迎えるには まだ早い。\:
Gufahahahah... no need to rush. It's still too
early for the Judgment of Souls to conclude.
Let's enjoy the show while it lasts.

258098.「不出来な 滅びの剣とのちがいを\n 見せてやろうぞ！ グワッハッハッハァー！:
Show me the difference between you and that
pathetic Sword of Perdition! Gwahahahah!!

258099.「……敵とはいえ 自分の似姿が\n 切り捨てられるサマは……胸くそ悪い。:
...Even if she was an enemy, seeing my own
likeness cut down like that... disgusts me.

258100.「ようやく あれの始末ができるな。: We can finally take care of that thing.

258101.「いろいろ 報告もあるし ヒズミを消したあと\n 一度 ファビエルのもとに戻ろう:
We have a lot to report. Once we're done with
the distortion, let's return to Fabiel.
